name: Descent Homage (Unity)
description:
This is a simple exercise in nostalgia, and the starter point for an eventual total recreation of Interplay's Descent I/II in Unity3D. The eventual goal is to implement all existing features and mechanics of the game, expand upon them heavily, add procedurally-generated levels and campaigns, and introduce a robust cooperative play system to the game.

Make sure to read the controls from the main menu!
